USE electric_vehicle_ldw
GO

--CREA LA VISTA bronze.vw_cafv_elegibility 
DROP VIEW IF EXISTS bronze.vw_cafv_elegibility  --si existe la vista, la elimina
GO

CREATE VIEW bronze.vw_cafv_elegibility
AS
SELECT cafv_eligibility_id, classification
FROM OPENROWSET(
    BULK 'bronze/cafv_eligibility.json',
    DATA_SOURCE = 'electric_vehicle_src',
    FORMAT = 'CSV',
    FIELDTERMINATOR = '0x0b',  --valor hexadecimal, separador de columnas (vertical tab)
    FIELDQUOTE = '0x0b',
    ROWTERMINATOR= '0X0b'
) WITH(
    jsonDoc NVARCHAR(MAX)
)AS cafv_eligibility
CROSS APPLY OPENJSON(jsonDoc)  --une los valores de jsonDoc y los valores obtenidos del documento JSON en la matriz por OPENJSON
WITH(
    cafv_eligibility_id SMALLINT '$.cafvEligibility', --cambia el nombre de la columna
    classification VARCHAR(100)   
)
GO

SELECT * FROM bronze.vw_cafv_elegibility;


--CREA LA VISTA vw_vehicle_type
DROP VIEW IF EXISTS bronze.vw_vehicle_type  --si existe la vista, la elimina
GO

CREATE VIEW bronze.vw_vehicle_type
AS
SELECT vehicleType, electric_vehicle_type
FROM OPENROWSET(
    BULK 'bronze/vehicle_type.json',
    DATA_SOURCE = 'electric_vehicle_src',
    FORMAT = 'CSV',
    FIELDTERMINATOR = '0x0b',
    FIELDQUOTE = '0x0b'
) WITH(
    jsonDoc NVARCHAR(MAX) --util para utilizar OPENJSON
)AS vehicle_type
CROSS APPLY OPENJSON(jsonDoc)  --une los valores de jsonDoc y los valores obtenidos del documento JSON enla matriz por OPENJSON
WITH(
    vehicleType SMALLINT,
    electric_vehicle_type VARCHAR(50) '$.electricVehicleType'   --cambia el nombre de la columna
)
GO


SELECT * FROM bronze.vw_vehicle_type
GO



--CREA LA VISTA vw_vehicle_registration_csv
--tabla "vehicle_registration_csv" con datos particionados por año y fecha - no filtra datos de toda la tabla, lee directamente de la particion     
DROP VIEW IF EXISTS bronze.vw_vehicle_registration_csv
GO

CREATE VIEW bronze.vw_vehicle_registration_csv
AS
SELECT 
    result.filepath(1) AS year,
    result.filepath(2) AS month,
    result.*
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'bronze/vehicle_registration_csv/year=*/month=*/*',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'electric_vehicle_src',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE
    ) WITH(
        vehicleId           INT,
        locationId          SMALLINT,
        propietaryId        TINYINT,
        dolVehicleId        INT,
        registrationDate    DATETIME2(7)
    )AS [result]
GO

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM bronze.vw_vehicle_registration_csv;

SELECT COUNT(*) 
FROM bronze.vw_vehicle_registration_csv 
WHERE year = '2024' and month = '01';
